title: ”多人游戏“按钮不见了？看看是不是Lockdown搞的鬼。
author: kn695
txt_content:
在和室友联机时发现多人游戏按钮不见了。经过我一番找寻发现了原因——
Lockdown - A simple mod to create worlds from templates
https://www.minecraftforum.net/forums/mapping-and-modding-java-edition/minecraft-mods/2126669-lockdown-a-simple-mod-to-create-worlds-from


Lockdown是一个相当小的mod，旨在使用预制地图的mod包，是为了方便那些整合包作者而制作的。
我在发布贴发现了作者说了这样一句话：
Lockdown also allows a few GUI elements to be disabled/removed. The button for changing the game mode of the world, the more world options button and the button for multiplayer are all configurable and are disabled by default.
果然在config文件夹里的Lockdown.cfg中找到了根源：
# Configuration file
"main menu" {    B:"Disable Multiplayer Button"=true    B:"Disable Singleplayer Button"=false}

"world creation" {    B:"Disable Game Mode Button"=true    B:"Disable More World Options Button"=true    B:"Disable Regular World Creation"=true    B:"Enable Overriding Template World Settings"=false    S:"World Template Directory"=template
}
把true改成false就好了
